text: "I'll Be Over You" is a 1986 song by American rock band Toto. It was released as the lead single to their sixth studio album Fahrenheit and went to number 11 in the United States, number 13 in Canada and number 38 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== # "I'll Be Over You" # "In a Word" - Non-album track, later released on Toto XX == References == Category:1986 songs Category:Toto (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: I'll Be Over You
